Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery ribbed vessel, the fabric is partially grey-black in section, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and one red-painted Greek character.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394214) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394214)
